name: searchParam
signature: <A = never, I extends string = never>(name: string, options?: { readonly schema?: Schema<A, I, never>; }) => Writable<[A] extends [never] ? string : Option<A>, [A] extends [never] ? string : Option<A>>
description: Create an Atom that reads and writes a URL search parameter. Note: If you pass a schema, it has to be synchronous and have no context.
documentation:
Create an Atom that reads and writes a URL search parameter.

Note: If you pass a schema, it has to be synchronous and have no context.
